name: Chuul
description: A massive crustacean-like creature covered in thick chitinous plates with large pincers and numerous writhing tentacles around its maw.
memorable: Its ability to paralyze and grapple prey makes it a terrifying predator lurking in swamps and ocean depths.
goals: To hunt and consume prey; often serves as a guardian for hidden places of power.
relations: Serves powerful eldritch entities and may be found alongside other aquatic or aberrant creatures.
environment: Commonly found in swamps or dark ocean depths.
strengths: High strength and resilience in combat, capable of grappling and paralyzing opponents.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity, limiting its ability to evade attacks.
attacks: Uses pincers to grapple and deal bludgeoning damage, and tentacles to paralyze opponents.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to paralyze a grappled target for one minute, severely hindering their ability to fight back.
senses: The Chuul has enhanced perception with a passive Perception of 14, allowing it to detect threats easily.
skills: Noteworthy perception due to its Wisdom score of 16.
additional_information: Immunities to poison damage and conditions like frightened and poisoned.
Can sense magic within 120 feet, revealing magical auras.
Grapples opponents with a successful pincer attack, allowing for mobility while grappling.
Resistant to various conditions, increasing its survivability in combat.
Exhibits deep, alien intelligence despite a very low intelligence score.
test_queries: large crustacean monster in the swamp
amphibious creature that paralyzes with tentacles
predator lurking in dark ocean depths
monster with powerful pincers and tentacles
guardian of underwater ruins that grapples prey
